messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: UNSUBSCRIBE ME NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: ... The instructions for unsubscribing are at the bottom of every email you get from this group.  You somehow managed to get yourself subscribed to the group.
messages.messageBody:
> You don't have to send an email to anyone to have anyone unsubscribe
> you. Just go to the unschooling dotcom yahoo page and click to be
> removed from the list. It happens instantly.

The instructions for unsubscribing are at the bottom of every email you get
from this group. You somehow managed to get yourself subscribed to the
group. It isn't rocket science to get unsubscribed. And I really wonder
where your anger is coming from.
Tia

messages.subject: Re: UNSUBSCRIBE ME NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: You don t have to send an email to anyone to have anyone unsubscribe you.  Just go to the unschooling dotcom yahoo page and click to be removed from the list.
messages.messageBody:
You don't have to send an email to anyone to have anyone unsubscribe
you. Just go to the unschooling dotcom yahoo page and click to be
removed from the list. It happens instantly.

Sheila

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] UNSUBSCRIBE ME  NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: ... == Um, I m not exactly sure what you think we re doing wrong, we re not sending them to you privately. Anyway, sometimes after you send an email to
messages.messageBody:
At 12:32 PM 10/6/02 -0700, BARBARA A THOMPSON wrote:

>STOP SENDING ME THESE EMAILS OR I WILL HAVE TO REPORT YOU PEOPLE.
==
Um, I'm not exactly sure what you think we're doing wrong, we're not
sending them to you privately. Anyway, sometimes after you send an email to
Unschooling-dotcom-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com it takes a while for the
program to get you off the list. Just be patient, please. I would suggest
sending an email to Unschooling-dotcom-owner@yahoogroups.com , or
support@yahoogroups.com if you continue to receive unwanted mail from this
list.

Todd
-------------------------------------
"Despite the high cost of living
it's still extremely popular!"
http://rambleman.tripod.com/index.html
